name: abssubi
body: |- wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0)))

stmt.origin: mp2an(wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

body.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(cfv(cabs, co(c0, cmin, c1)), cfv(cabs, co(c1, cmin, c0)))
-| wcel(c0, cc)
-| wcel(c1, cc)

comment: Swapping order of subtraction doesn't change the absolute value. Example of [Apostol] p. 363. (Contributed by NM, 1-Oct-1999.)
